item.wjsweapons.knife_subtext_1: Launches user in the direction they're facing upon right click
item.wjsweapons.knife_subtext_2: Sends the user further if they are sneaking on the ground
item.wjsweapons.knife_subtext_4: Can launch entities by right-clicking while sneaking
item.wjsweapons.dw_subtext_1: Causes anything it hits to glow
item.wjsweapons.dw_subtext_2: Does extra damage to undead mobs
item.wjsweapons.dw_subtext_3: Sets enemies on fire upon right-clicking
item.wjsweapons.dw_subtext_5: Applies extra damage to all mobs when the
item.wjsweapons.db_subtext_1: Upon killing an enemy, the user becomes invisible
item.wjsweapons.db_subtext_2: Does extra damage to mobs while the user is invisible
item.wjsweapons.fhp_subtext_2: Sets enemies on fire upon attacking
item.wjsweapons.fhp_subtext_3: Rarely gives the player a diamond upon mining a block
item.wjsweapons.sh_subtext_1: Dramatically lowers user's gravity when worn
item.wjsweapons.rb_subtext_1: Allows flight by holding down the jump key
item.wjsweapons.rb_subtext_2: User travels 2.5x faster in the air when worn
